Title: Relates to the offense of aggravated cruelty to animals
Summary: Includes use of a deadly weapon or dangerous instrument in the offense of aggravated cruelty to animals.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to including use of a deadly weapon or dangerous instrument as an aggravated cruelty offense
